org.jasig.cas.web.report

Class SingleSignOnSessionsReportController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.web.report.SingleSignOnSessionsReportController

  • @Controller(value="singleSignOnSessionsReportController")
public final class SingleSignOnSessionsReportController
extends java.lang.Object
    SSO Report web controller that produces JSON data for the view.
